Action to Take if a Tropical Disease Was Treated in Service
Follow the instructions in the table below when service records show the Veteran was treated for a tropical disease.
If the Veteran ...
Then ...
files a substantially complete claim for the condition
refer the case to the rating activity.
did not file a claim for the condition
solicit a claim.

.
